## Problem Statement
What problem are you trying to solve? Why is it important?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you imagine this working. Call out the workspace(s) it touches (FE, API, worker, shared, infra, docs, etc.).

## Alternatives Considered
List any other approaches you evaluated and why they were rejected.

## Impact / Risks
- User impact
- Performance implications
- Legal / privacy / scraping constraints

## Additional Context
Mockups, links, scripts, or anything else that helps explain the request.
